de.btu.openinfra.backend.db

Class EntityManagerFactoryCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.btu.openinfra.backend.db.EntityManagerFactoryCache

  • public class EntityManagerFactoryCache
extends Object
    This class is a container to cache objects from the class EntityManagerFactory. The class uses the singleton implementation.
    Author:
    BTU DBIS

    • Method Detail

      • getEntityManagerFactory

        public static javax.persistence.EntityManagerFactory getEntityManagerFactory(UUID currentProjectId,
                                                             OpenInfraSchemas schema)
        Returns an entity factory manager for the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        currentProjectId - identifier of the current project
        schema - this parameter defines the schema
        Returns:
        entity factory manager if an entry exists in the cache or it is possible to add an entry in the cache for the given parameters, otherwise null

        Returns the maximum number of cache entries.
        Returns:

        Sets the maximum number of cache entries
        Parameters:
        cacheSize - new maximum number of cache entries
